answers.answer: due to your age and health issues DO NOT attempt this on your own, without a doctor.i have never been on celebrex so i will concede to others with experience.i have read some odd side effects such as vertigo along with depression, lack of energy, etci do know this med has to be weaned very slowly.  your doctor should give you a good taper plan.  do not just stop taking this med.welcome to MH and i am sure many will give you more info about stopping this med

question: What might I expect as to celebrex withdral effects...have been on it most of the time, 200mg in am, for recovery from 2 knee replacements over last 14 months, have diabetes, insulin, arthritis, high blood pressure and old age, 80. Think its time to try it without, but leary of possible wiyhdrawl symptoms.cant find any exact answers, all seem to wander to withdrawl of other meds which I do not use
title: celebrex withdral symptoms
